nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_713
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I remember the whole thing clearly as though it had happened yesterday.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_714
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Whichever of them writes the best essay will win the prize.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_715
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It turned out that the budget provided for a salary increase one year later.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_716
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She did the same job day after day and year after year, but she never complained.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_717
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She endured all kinds of hardships on the journey; nothing could keep her from finding her lost daughter.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_718
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Don't get mixed up with that gang. They have committed many bad things in broad daylight.
